Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GlobalGoals

Class EightTiles

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GlobalGoals.GlobalGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GlobalGoals.EightTiles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class EightTiles extends GlobalGoal
The EightTiles class represents a global goal called "Eight Tiles" of the game. This goal checks if a specified number of tiles of the same color are present on the shelf. It extends the GlobalGaol abstract class.

  • Method Details

    • check

      public boolean check(Shelf s) throws MissingShelfException
      Checks if the given shelf satisfies the EightTiles global goal. The shelf must have a specified number of tiles of the same color.
      Specified by:
      check in class GlobalGoal
      Parameters:
      s - the shelf to check.
      Returns:
      true if the shelf satisfies the EightTiles global goal, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      MissingShelfException - if the shelf is missing or null.
